title: Ticket #3023: Configurable poll intervals for Condor-G based on number of jobs
description:
Condor-G has many poll-based GAHPs; polling too frequently is improper when there are a lot of jobs, but polling too infrequently makes life miserable when debugging.

Since GT5, Condor, and blahp are all poll-based (5 minute polls), this is more apparent than GT2 (where the grid_monitor helped).

Can we have an adjustable interval? Ideally this would be, per-user per-resource, but just per-resource is fine for now. I would suggest:

  • 10 seconds for 1-100 jobs
  • 1 minute for 100-1000 jobs
  • X minutes for X*1000 through (X-1)*1000 jobs.
